title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Floral Vignettes", 1800–1818
medium: brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Floral vignettes vertically placed. Oriental motifs including small flowers, a bamboo gate, a blue and white Chinese vase, a bridge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Floral Vignettes", 1800–1818.
1800–1818. brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1957-46-30.
